LanguageData.AArmoury_NeedToTargetCaster: This ability needs to target its caster
LanguageData.AArmoury_CantAcceptCategory: Weapon doesn't accept that trait category.
LanguageData.AArmoury_CantGenerateAlone: That trait can't be generated alone.
LanguageData.AArmoury_NoTraits: {0} doesn't have any traits to remove.
LanguageData.AArmoury_RemovedTrait: Weapon trait "{0}" has been removed from {1}. It's gone, Jim.
LanguageData.AArmoury_GunsSupportingTrait: Guns that can use this trait:
LanguageData.AArmoury_MinWeaponTraitsDesc: By default, unique weapons have a minimum of 1 weapon trait. Changes to this will only affect newly spawned weapons, not existing ones.
LanguageData.AArmoury_MaxWeaponTraitsDesc: By default, unique weapons have a maximum of 3 weapon traits. Changes to this will only affect newly spawned weapons, not existing ones.
